WindingThreshold: Winding number threshold to determine what is consider inside the mesh
ExtendBounds: How far we allow bounds of solid surface to go beyond the bounds of the original input surface before clamping / cutting the surface off
SurfaceSearchSteps: How many binary search steps to take when placing vertices on the surface
bSolidAtBoundaries: Whether to fill at the border of the bounding box, if the surface extends beyond the voxel boundaries
ThickenShells: Thicken open-boundary surfaces (extrude them inwards) to ensure they are captured in the VoxWrap output. Units are in world space.
